description:
Company Overview:
• This is a 30+ year old roofing company servicing South Florida
• This company services high-end oceanfront homes and offers tile, metal, and flat roofing replacements, repairs, maintenance, and installations for new construction homes
• Authorized dealer of Ludowici products
• This company is in growth mode and is looking to add a Sales Manager to help continue their growth

What is Being Offered:
• Flexible compensation, base + bonus (total $150K+)
• Benefits
• PTO
• Car package
• Relocation assistance

What The Position is About:
• Oversee a team of in-home sales reps to achieve sales targets and increase revenue
• Recruit, hire, and train the sales roster
• Coach, mentor and motivate the sales team
• Conduct check-ins and ride-alongs with the sales reps
• Lead weekly sales meetings
• Develop and implement sales strategies to increase market share and customer base
• Monitor sales metrics and performance, and provide regular feedback to the sales team

The Right Candidate Will Have:
• Sales management experience within the home improvement industry
• Experience building and leading a successful sales team
• The ability to hold others accountable while fostering a collaborative and supportive environment
• Experience with Rilla or similar software is a plus
